public class TUI extends Object implements View
Main class of the TUI.

    • TUI

      public TUI(CommandPassthrough serverProxy, Consumer<ModelUpdater> setClientModelUpdater, BlockingQueue<String> inputQueue)
      Constructs the TUI
      Parameters:
      serverProxy - proxy to the game server to which commands should be sent to
      setClientModelUpdater - setter consumer for the VirtualClient's modelUpdater
      inputQueue - the queue from which input will be read

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run() throws RemoteException, DisconnectException, TimeoutException
      Launches the TUI
      Specified by:
      run in interface View
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection error occurs while communicating with the server
      DisconnectException - if the disconnect command is input and the disconnection succeeds
      TimeoutException - if the server disconnects the client for timeout

    • update

      public void update(SceneID sceneID, DisplayEvent event)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Notifies the scene of an event. Creates the OpponentScene if it didn't exist.
      Events may be treated differently whether the scene with given ID is the currentScene or not.
      Events notified to a non-existing scene are ignored.
      Specified by:
      update in interface View
      Parameters:
      sceneID - scene ID as obtained via SceneID.getXSceneID()
      event - an event to notify

    • showError

      public void showError(String errorMsg)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Displays an error message on the current scene.
      Specified by:
      showError in interface View
      Parameters:
      errorMsg - the error message.

    • setRefreshTimer

      public void setRefreshTimer()
      Sets a timer to refresh the currentScene in 500 ms.
      Resets the timer if one was already running.

      This method prevents excessive flashing on the screen by limiting refresh rate to at most twice a second.

    • showNotification

      public void showNotification(String notification)
      Adds a notification to the backlog and refreshes the scene (using the refresh timer)
      Specified by:
      showNotification in interface View
      Parameters:
      notification - the text notification to be displayed

    • showChatMessage

      public void showChatMessage(String messenger, String msg)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Displays a new chat message.
      Specified by:
      showChatMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      messenger - the author of the message
      msg - the message as text

    • notifyTimeout

      public void notifyTimeout()
      Notifies the timeout to the TUI (to later raise the TimeoutException in run()) and displays the timeout disconnection as an error.
      Specified by:
      notifyTimeout in interface View

    • setBacklogs

      public void setBacklogs(TUI_Scene scene)
      Sets both backlog of a scene to this TUI's backlogs
      Parameters:
